chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T : ty), j E t T -> forall (x : nat) (U : ty) (E' : env ty), insert x U E = E' -> j E' (shift x t) T

Premises:
env = fun A : Type => list (option A) : Type -> Type Arguments env _%type_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Notation shift := (lift 1)
Inductive term : Set := TVar : nat -> term | TAbs : term -> term | TApp : term -> term -> term Arguments TVar _%nat_scope
Inductive j : env ty -> term -> ty -> Prop := JVar : forall (E : env ty) (x : nat) (T : ty), lookup x E = Some T -> j E (TVar x) T | JAbs : forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> j E (TAbs t) (TyArrow T1 T2) | JApp : forall (E : env ty) (t1 t2 : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> j E t2 T1 -> j E (TApp t1 t2) T2 Arguments JVar _ _%nat_scope [T] Arguments JAbs [E t T1 T2] Arguments JApp [E t1 t2 T1 T2]
Inductive ty : Set := TyIota : ty | TyArrow : ty -> ty -> ty
j_ind : forall P : env ty -> term -> ty -> Prop, (forall (E : env ty) (x : nat) (T : ty), lookup x E = Some T -> P E (TVar x) T) -> (forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> P (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> P E (TAbs t) (TyArrow T1 T2)) -> (forall (E : env ty) (t1 t2 : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> P E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> j E t2 T1 -> P E t2 T1 -> P E (TApp t1 t2) T2) -> forall (e : env ty) (t : term) (t0 : ty), j e t t0 -> P e t t0
j_sind : forall P : env ty -> term -> ty -> SProp, (forall (E : env ty) (x : nat) (T : ty), lookup x E = Some T -> P E (TVar x) T) -> (forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> P (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> P E (TAbs t) (TyArrow T1 T2)) -> (forall (E : env ty) (t1 t2 : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> P E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> j E t2 T1 -> P E t2 T1 -> P E (TApp t1 t2) T2) -> forall (e : env ty) (t : term) (t0 : ty), j e t t0 -> P e t t0
JVar : forall (E : env ty) (x : nat) (T : ty), lookup x E = Some T -> j E (TVar x) T
JAbs : forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> j E (TAbs t) (TyArrow T1 T2)
JApp : forall (E : env ty) (t1 t2 : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> j E t2 T1 -> j E (TApp t1 t2) T2
rotate = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T) (n : nat) (t : T) => subst (var n) 0 (shift (S n) t) : forall V : Type, Var V -> forall T : Type, Lift T -> Subst V T -> nat -> T -> T Arguments rotate {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0 H1} _%nat_scope
Lift_Traverse = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Traverse V T) => {| lift := fun (w k : nat) (t : T) => traverse (fun l x : nat => var (lift w (l + k) x)) 0 t |} : forall V : Type, Var V -> forall T : Type, Traverse V T -> Lift T Arguments Lift_Traverse {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0}
Subst_Traverse = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (H0 : Traverse V V) (T : Type) (H1 : Traverse V T) => {| subst := fun (v : V) (k : nat) (t : T) => traverse (fun l x : nat => subst_idx (lift l 0 v) (l + k) x) 0 t |} : forall V : Type, Var V -> Traverse V V -> forall T : Type, Traverse V T -> Subst V T Arguments Subst_Traverse {V}%type_scope {H H0} {T}%type_scope {H1}
closed = fun (T : Type) (H : Lift T) (k : nat) (t : T) => shift k t = t : forall T : Type, Lift T -> nat -> T -> Prop Arguments closed {T}%type_scope {H} _%nat_scope
closed_lift_invariant : forall k t : nat, closed k t -> forall j : nat, j >= k -> forall w : nat, lift w j t = t
insert_eq_insert_2 : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (a1 a2 : A) (e1 e2 : env A), insert x a1 e1 = insert x a2 e2 -> forall b : A, insert x b e1 = insert x b e2
Build_TraverseRelative : forall (V T : Type) (H : Traverse V T), (forall (f g : nat -> nat -> V) (p : nat) (t : T) (m l : nat), (forall l0 x : nat, f (l0 + p) x = g l0 x) -> m = l + p -> traverse f m t = traverse g l t) -> TraverseRelative
subsume_insert_inversion : forall (A : Type) (sub : A -> A -> Prop) (e1 : env A) (x : nat) (a2 : A) (e2 : env A), subsume sub e1 (insert x a2 e2) -> exists (f1 : env A) (a1 : A), e1 = insert x a1 f1 /\ subsume sub f1 e2 /\ sub a1 a2
insert_eq_insert_1 : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (a1 a2 : A) (e1 e2 : env A), insert x a1 e1 = insert x a2 e2 -> a1 = a2
closed_monotonic : LiftLift -> forall k t : nat, closed k t -> forall j : nat, j >= k -> closed j t
map_insert_eq : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (x : nat) (a : A) (b : B) (e : env A), f a = b -> map f (insert x a e) = insert x b (map f e)
map_insert_map : forall (A : Type) (f g h : A -> A) (x : nat) (a : A) (e : env A), (forall a0 : A, f (g a0) = g (h a0)) -> map f (insert x a (map g e)) = insert x (f a) (map g (map h e))
insert_nil : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (a : A) (e : env A), insert x a e = nil -> False
Record TraverseRelative (V T : Type) (H : Traverse V T) : Prop := Build_TraverseRelative { traverse_relative : forall (f g : nat -> nat -> V) (p : nat) (t : T) (m l : nat), (forall l0 x : nat, f (l0 + p) x = g l0 x) -> m = l + p -> traverse f m t = traverse g l t } Arguments TraverseRelative {V T}%type_scope {H} Arguments Build_TraverseRelative [V T]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
empty_eq_insert : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (o : A) (e : env A), empty A = insert x o e -> False
map_insert : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (x : nat) (a : A) (e : env A), map f (insert x a e) = insert x (f a) (map f e)
insert_eq_insert_3 : forall (A : Type) (x1 x2 : nat) (a1 a2 : A) (e1 e2 : env A), insert x1 a1 e1 = insert x2 a2 e2 -> x1 <> x2 -> exists (e : env A) (y1 y2 : nat), e1 = insert y1 a2 e /\ e2 = insert y2 a1 e /\ shift x1 y1 = x2 /\ y2 = (if le_gt_dec x1 y1 then x1 else x1 - 1)
lift = fun (T : Type) (Lift0 : Lift T) => let (lift) := Lift0 in lift : forall T : Type, Lift T -> nat -> nat -> T -> T Arguments lift {T}%type_scope {Lift} (_ _)%nat_scope
traverse_traverse_var : TraverseFunctorial -> TraverseRelative -> TraverseIdentifiesVar -> forall (f : nat -> nat -> nat) (g : nat -> nat -> term) (t : term) (l : nat), traverse g l (traverse_var f l t) = traverse (fun l0 x : nat => g l0 (f l0 x)) l t
subst_subst : forall (t : term) (k : nat) (v : term) (s : nat) (w : term), k <= s -> subst v s (subst w k t) = subst (subst v s w) k (subst (shift k v) (1 + s) t)
Build_TraverseVarIsIdentity : forall (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Traverse V T), (forall f : nat -> nat -> V, (forall l x : nat, f l x = var x) -> forall (t : T) (l : nat), traverse f l t = t) -> TraverseVarIsIdentity
Build_SubstLift : forall (T : Type) (H : Lift T) (V : Type) (H0 : Subst V T), (forall (v : V) (k : nat) (t : T), subst v k (shift k t) = t) -> SubstLift
recognize_subst : TraverseFunctorial -> TraverseIdentifiesVar -> TraverseRelative -> TraverseRelative -> forall traverse_ : (nat -> nat -> term) -> nat -> term -> term, traverse_ = traverse -> forall (v : term) (k2 k1 : nat) (t : term), traverse_ (fun l x : nat => subst_idx (lift l 0 v) (l + k2) x) k1 t = subst (lift k1 0 v) (k1 + k2) t
traverse_relative : forall (f g : nat -> nat -> term) (p : nat) (t : term) (m l : nat), (forall l0 x : nat, f (l0 + p) x = g l0 x) -> m = l + p -> traverse f m t = traverse g l t
TraverseVarIsIdentity_term = {| traverse_var_is_identity := fun (f : nat -> nat -> term) (H : forall l x : nat, f l x = var x) (t : term) => term_ind (fun t0 : term => forall l : nat, traverse f l t0 = t0) (fun n l : nat => H l n) (fun (t0 : term) (IHt : forall l : nat, traverse f l t0 = t0) (l : nat) => let H0 : traverse_term f (1 + l) t0 = t0 := IHt (1 + l) in (fun H1 : traverse_term f (1 + l) t0 = t0 => eq_trans (f_equal (fun f0 : term -> term => f0 (traverse_term f (1 + l) t0)) eq_refl) (f_equal TAbs H1)) H0) (fun (t1 : term) (IHt1 : forall l : nat, traverse f l t1 = t1) (t2 : term) (IHt2 : forall l...
Build_SubstSubst : forall (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (H0 : Subst V V) (T : Type) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s : nat) (w : V), k <= s -> subst v s (subst w k t) = subst (subst v s w) k (subst (shift k v) (1 + s) t)) -> SubstSubst
recognize_lift : TraverseRelative -> forall (w k1 k2 : nat) (t : term) (traverse_ : (nat -> nat -> term) -> nat -> term -> term), traverse_ = traverse -> traverse_ (fun l x : nat => var (lift w (l + k2) x)) k1 t = lift w (k1 + k2) t
TraverseRelative_term = {| traverse_relative := fun (f g : nat -> nat -> term) (p : nat) (t : term) => term_ind (fun t0 : term => forall m l : nat, (forall l0 x : nat, f (l0 + p) x = g l0 x) -> m = l + p -> traverse f m t0 = traverse g l t0) (fun (n m l : nat) (H : forall l0 x : nat, f (l0 + p) x = g l0 x) (H0 : m = l + p) => eq_ind_r (fun m0 : nat => traverse f m0 (TVar n) = traverse g l (TVar n)) (H l n) H0) (fun (t0 : term) (IHt : forall m l : nat, (forall l0 x : nat, f (l0 + p) x = g l0 x) -> m = l + p -> traverse f m t0 = traverse g l t0) (m l : nat) (H : forall l0 x...
agree_below : forall (A : Type) (e1 e2 : env A) (x : nat) (a : A) (k : nat), lookup x e1 = Some a -> x < k -> agree e1 e2 k -> lookup x e2 = Some a
Build_Pun2 : forall (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (t : T) (k : nat), subst (var k) k (shift (S k) t) = t) -> Pun2
Build_Pun1 : forall (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (t : T) (k : nat), subst (var k) (S k) (shift k t) = t) -> Pun1
Build_LiftSubst : forall (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) (lift w (1 + k) s) (lift w (shift s k) t)) -> LiftSubst
Record SubstSubst (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (H0 : Subst V V) (T : Type) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_SubstSubst { subst_subst : forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s : nat) (w : V), k <= s -> subst v s (subst w k t) = subst (subst v s w) k (subst (shift k v) (1 + s) t) } Arguments SubstSubst {V}%type_scope {H H0} {T}%type_scope {H1} Arguments Build_SubstSubst [V]%type_scope _ _ [T]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
traverse = fun (V T : Type) (Traverse0 : Traverse V T) => let (traverse) := Traverse0 in traverse : forall V T : Type, Traverse V T -> (nat -> nat -> V) -> nat -> T -> T Arguments traverse {V T}%type_scope {Traverse} _%function_scope _%nat_scope
traverse_extensional : TraverseRelative -> forall f g : nat -> nat -> term, (forall l x : nat, f l x = g l x) -> forall (t : term) (l : nat), traverse f l t = traverse g l t

``` 
intros E t T H x U E' H0 H1.
induction H; intros.
- simpl. apply JVar. apply insert_eq_insert_1 in H1. rewrite H1. assumption.
- simpl. apply JAbs. apply IHj. apply Build_SubstSubst. intros. specialize (H3 t0 k v s w H4).
rewrite H3. reflexivity.
- simpl. apply JApp with (T1:=T1).
  + apply IHj1. apply Build_SubstSubst. intros. specialize (H5 v k1 t H6 s w). rewrite H5. reflexivity.
  + apply IHj2. apply Build_SubstSubst. intros. specialize (H5 v k2 t H6 s w). rewrite H5. reflexivity.
```

original: intros E t T H x U E' H0 H1. induction H; intros. - simpl. apply JVar. apply insert_eq_insert_1 in H1. rewrite H1. auto. - simpl. apply JAbs. apply IHj. apply Build_SubstSubst. intros. specialize (H3 t0 k v s w H4). rewrite H3. reflexivity. - simpl. apply JApp with (T1:=T1). + apply IHj1. apply Build_SubstSubst. intros. specialize (H5 v k1 t H6 s w). rewrite H5. reflexivity. + apply IHj2. apply Build_SubstSubst. intros. specialize (H5 v k2 t H6 s w). rewrite H5. reflexivity.
